card.name: Red
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put a Pokémon card revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. [−3]: You may put a Pokémon card from your hand onto the battlefield. [−7]: For each Pokémon you control, create a token that's a copy of that Pokémon.

card.name: Blue
card.text: [+2]: Target Pokémon gets +3/-1. [-3]: Discard a card, then return a Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. [−7]: Pokémon you control get +3/+3 and gain lifelink, indestructible, haste, vigilance, and hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Green
card.text: [+1]: Each player searches their library for an artifact card, puts it into their hand, and shuffles. [-2]: Return an enchantment or artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. [−5]: For each Pokémon you control, search your library for a TM card and put it onto the battlefield enchanting that Pokémon. Then shuffle.

card.name: Brock
card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gets +2/+2 until end of turn. [−2]: Search your library for a Rock or Ground card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. [−4]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, put two +1/+1 counters on it."

card.name: Misty
card.text: [+1]: Tap or untap target Pokémon. [−1]: Target Water Pokémon gains unblockable until end of turn. [−6]: Draw two cards for each Pokémon you control. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

card.name: Lt. Surge
card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gains vigilance and haste until end of turn. [−3]: Pokémon you control with first strike gain double strike until end of turn, then Pokémon you control gain first strike until end of turn. [−6]: Target Pokémon gains indestructible until end of turn. Lt. Surge deals 12 damage to each Pokémon.

card.name: Erika
card.text: [+1]: Add {G}, {U}, or {W}. [-2]: Reveal your hand. You gain 1 life for each Pokémon card revealed this way. [−X]: Pokémon you control get +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Koga
card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gains infect until end of turn. [-2]: Put two -1/-1 counters on target Pokémon. You gain life equal to the number of counters on that Pokémon. [−6]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have {B}: this Pokémon gains shadow until end of turn."

card.name: Sabrina
card.text: [+1]: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. [-2]: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card third from the top. [-4]: Target player discards a card, then each player draws cards equal to the number of cards in their hand.

card.text: [+1]: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. [0]: Up to three target Pokémon get +1/+0 until end of turn. [−3]: You get an emblem with "Medicine cards in your hand have flash."

card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gets +0/+4 until end of turn. [-3]: Exile target Pokémon with power greater than its toughness. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a Pokémon you control dies, return it to your hand at the beginning of your end step."

card.name: Bill
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Pokéball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Switch
card.text: Return target Pokémon you control to its owner's hand. If you do, put a Pokémon with equal or lesser mana value from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Master Ball
card.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your library. Put up to one Pokémon card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Stonefinder Radar
card.text: Search your library for a Stone card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Pokéflute
card.text: Untap all Pokémon you control.

card.name: Bubble Blower
card.text: Search your library for a Water card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Revive
card.text: Return target Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Max Revive
card.text: Return target Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Energy Search Mk2
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put it on the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle.

card.name: Gambler
card.text: Shuffle your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Mysterious Fossil
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card with fossil and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Explore
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Revitalize
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Rummage
card.text: Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards until end of turn.

card.name: Show of Force
card.text: Show of Force deals 1 damage to each Pokémon without flying. Draw a card.

card.name: Investigate
card.text: Scry 2. Draw a card.

card.name: Potion
card.text: Remove all damage from target Pokémon.

card.name: Super Potion
card.text: Target Pokémon gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Lemonade
card.text: Untap target Pokémon and remove all damage from it. It gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Weather Control Device
card.text: Shuffle target land you control into your library. If you do, search your library for a basic land card and put it into play. Then shuffle.

card.name: PlusPower
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: X-Attack
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: X-Defense
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Guard Spec.
card.text: Target Pokémon gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Antidote
card.text: Remove up to three -1/-1 counters from target Pokémon or up to three poison counters from target player.

card.name: Ice Heal
card.text: Untap target Pokémon. It gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Psych Up
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target Pokémon.

card.name: Forced Adaptation
card.text: Evolve target Pokémon, then it fights target Pokémon.

card.name: Devolution Spray
card.text: Exile target Pokémon, then return it to battlefield under its owner’s control. That Pokémon can’t activate evolve abilities this turn.

card.name: Item Finder
card.text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: VS Seeker
card.text: Each player searches their library for a card, reveals it, shuffles, and puts that card on top.

card.name: Body Slam
card.text: Target Pokémon you control deals damage equal to its power to target Pokémon you don't control. If the Pokémon you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that Pokémon's controller instead.

card.name: Slash
card.text: Slash deals 4 damage to target Pokémon.

card.name: Mist
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Whirlwind
card.text: Return target Pokémon to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

card.name: Sing
card.text: Tap all Pokémon target player controls. Those Pokémon don't untap during that player's next untap step.

card.name: Smog
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking Pokémon. Each player gets a poison counter.

card.name: String Shot
card.text: All Pokémon lose haste and hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Swift
card.text: Damage can't be prevented this turn.

card.name: Disable
card.text: Split second Until end of turn, target Pokémon can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Fire Spin
card.text: Fire Spin deals 2 damage to target Pokémon. If that Pokémon would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Gust
card.text: Gust deals 2 damage to target Pokémon with flying. If that Pokémon is attacking, Gust deals 5 damage instead.

card.name: Slam
card.text: Destroy target tapped Pokémon.

card.name: Poison Sting
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target Pokémon. Draw a card.

card.name: Glare
card.text: Target Pokémon can't block this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Thunder Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Thunder Stone deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Leaf Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. Sacrifice Leaf Stone: Add {G}{G}{G}.

card.name: Water Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. Sacrifice Water Stone: Scry 3.

card.name: Fire Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. Sacrifice Fire Stone: Fire Stone deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Moonstone
card.text: {T}: Add {B} or {W}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Pokédoll
card.text: Sacrifice Pokédoll: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Silph Scope
card.text: All Pokémon lose shadow and unblockable. Damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Old Rod
card.text: {T}: Search your library for a Water Pokémon with an evolve ability, then shuffle and put that card third from the top.

card.name: Ancient Slab
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Pokémon Storage System
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Pokémon Storage System to your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Town Map
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Town Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Super Repel
card.text: No more than two Pokémon can attack you each combat.

card.name: Nugget
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Nugget: Add one mana of any color. When Nugget is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Mysterious Feather
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Feather: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Thunderbolt
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever this Pokémon deals damage to another Pokémon, that Pokémon doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step."

card.name: Ice Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "1U: Tap target Pokémon."

card.name: Hyper Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon with no evolve abilities Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Destroy target Pokémon. This Pokémon doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step."

card.name: Focus Energy
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "T: put a +1/+1 counter on this Pokémon." When enchanted Pokémon has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Focus Energy. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Quick Attack
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon gets +1/+0 and has haste and first strike.

card.name: Hydro Pump
card.text: Enchant Water Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon gets +2/+0 and has "{1U}, {T}: Return target Pokémon to its owner's hand."

card.name: Fire Blast
card.text: Enchant Fire Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: This Pokémon deals damage equal to its power to target Pokémon. If that Pokémon dies this turn, exile it."

card.name: Solar Beam
card.text: Enchant Grass Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon gets +0/+2 and has “{T}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you control this Pokémon, it deals damage equal to its toughness to a Pokémon of your choice.”

card.name: Guillotine
card.text: Enchant Bug Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Flip a coin. If heads, destroy target Pokémon."

card.name: Splash
card.text: Enchant Pokémon

card.name: Rock Throw
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Sacrifice Rock Throw: Enchanted Pokémon deals 4 damage to target Pokémon.

card.name: Conversion
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{2}: This Pokémon becomes the types and colors of your choice until end of turn."

card.name: Barrier
card.text: Enchant Pokémon {T}: Target Pokémon gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Counter
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon is dealt damage by another Pokémon, it deals twice that much damage to that Pokémon.

card.name: Flash
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Sacrifice Flash: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Mega Drain
card.text: Enchant Grass or Bug Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Minimize
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon would be dealt combat damage, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Pay Day
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Sky Attack
card.text: Enchant Flying Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has flying and gets +2/+0.

card.name: Light Screen
card.text: Enchant Psychic Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Target Pokémon gains hexproof until end of turn."

card.name: Teleport
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Return this Pokémon and all TMs attached to it to their owners' hand."

card.name: Growth
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Toxic
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has infect.

card.name: Dream Eater
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.

card.name: Psywave
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon attacks or blocks, reveal the top card of your library. Enchanted Pokémon's base power becomes the mana value of the revealed card until end of turn.

card.name: Pallet Town
card.text: {T}: Add {W}. {T}: Add {W}{W}. Spend this mana only to cast Pokémon spells with mana value 2 or less.

card.name: Pewter City
Cerulean City
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. {T}: Return target Water Pokémon you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Viridian City
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. If you control a Stone, add {G}{G} instead.

card.name: Saffron City
Celadon City
Vermillion City
Fuchsia City
card.text: {T}: Add {B}. {2}{B}, {T}: Fuchsia City deals 2 damage to target player and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Cinnabar Island
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. {T}, Sacrifice Cinnabar Island: Destroy target land.

card.name: Lavender Town
Cinnabar Lab
card.text: {T}: Add {1} {T}: Add {3}. Spend this mana only to activate fossil abilities.

card.name: Safari Zone
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Safari Zone: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Bill's Grassland
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Grassland. {1}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Grassland: Add {W} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Volcano
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Volcano. {1}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Volcano: Add {R} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Rainforest
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Rainforest. {1}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Rainforest: Add {G} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Marsh
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Marsh. {1}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Marsh: Add {B} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Coastline
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Coastline. {1}, Remove any number of storage counters from Bill's Coastline: Add {U} for each storage counter removed this way.
